          <title>
            <string language="sl">Goriščna  razdalja posamezne leče v sistemu treh leč</string>
            <string language="en">Find the focal length of each lens in the 3-lens system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie die fokale Länge jedes Objektivs im 
System 3-lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez la longueur focale de chaque objectif 
dans le système 3-lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre o comprimento focal de cada lente no 
sistema 3-lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi la lunghezza focale di ogni obiettivo nel 
sistema 3-lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε το εστιακό μήκος κάθε φακού στο σύστημα 
3-φακών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encuentre la longitud focal de cada lente en el 
sistema 3-lens</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prehod svetlobe skozi sistem treh konveksnih leč.</string>
            <string language="en">The light is passing through the system of three convex lenses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sistem leč</string>
            <string language="en">lens systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">goriščna razdalja</string>
            <string language="en">focal length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">leča</string>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Licht überschreitet durch das System von 
drei konvexen Objektiven.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lumière traverse le système de trois 
objectifs convexes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz está passando através do sistema de três
lentes convexas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce sta attraversando il sistema di tre 
obiettivi convessi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το φως περνά μέσω του συστήματος τριών κυρτών φακών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz está pasando a través del sistema de 
tres lentes convexas.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
